# HMCharacteristicValueLabelNamespace.numeral

**Case**

The label index indicates the arabic numeral, like 1, 2, 3, and so on.

## Declaration

```swift
case numeral
```

## Namespaces

- **HMCharacteristicValueLabelNamespace.dot**: The label index indicates the number of dots, like `.`, `..`, `...`, and so on.

items.description: The label index indicates the number of dots, like `.`, `..`, `...`, and so on.
